text: Kho buli shiamulala wabu khwamutila nende eshinyasio khulwe tsimbii tsitsie, abaandi mubo khwabarerera imbumbeyeka yetsimbale, ne abaandi mubo baliwo barusibwa emioyo khuluyoka, ne abaandi mubo baliwo bakhwakhola liloba okhubamila, ne abaandi mubo baliwo basishibwa munyanza, ne Nyasaye shiyabakholela obubii tawe, halali bo abeene nibo bekholela obubii
